Package ru.nsu.rebrin

Class SnakeModel

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.rebrin.SnakeModel
public class SnakeModel extends Object
The SnakeModel class handles the game logic for the Snake game, including movement, collision detection, apple spawning, and AI snakes.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes

    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    SnakeModel.Direction
    Enum representing possible movement directions for the snake.
